description: This is a Python source file defining a utility function 'pagination_envelope' that generates a standard pagination response envelope for list endpoints, including handling for iterable inputs and pagination parameters.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] pagination_envelope( items: Union[Sequence[Any], Iterable[Any]], total: int, limit: int, offset: int, )
methods.description: Builds a standard pagination envelope containing items, total count, limit, and offset, ensuring items are materialized as a list.

ctags.name: pagination_envelope
ctags.signature: ( items: Union[Sequence[Any], Iterable[Any]], total: int, limit: int, offset: int, )
